name: Docker
description: Docker can be used to make sure servers behave how they should. I reccomend it for most servers.

name: The Ultimate Tech Quiz
description: A web app that will give users 10 new technical questions each day and track their progress in things like programming, cybersecurity, database architecture, and more! I plan to create this and am looking for collaborators, please leave a comment with your info if you would like to be involved.

name: Paradigms of JavaScript
description: Object Oriented Programming, Functional Programming, and Procedural Programming. It is important to understand the differences between the three and recognize when to use different methods.
